error.name: Overextended Bounding Box
error.symptom: Bounding box includes adjacent elements or excessive whitespace
error.cause: Not carefully tracing the actual content boundaries
error.fix: Use grid lines to identify exactly where content starts and ends

error.name: Overlapping Elements
error.symptom: Two elements have overlapping coordinate ranges when they shouldn't
error.cause: Not checking for gaps between elements
error.fix: Verify that adjacent elements have clear boundaries between them

error.name: Invalid Cell References
error.symptom: Lowercase letters, spaces, or out-of-range values
error.fix: Always use UPPERCASE letters, no spaces, valid row numbers (1-{rows})

error.name: Missing Elements
error.cause: Not thoroughly scanning the entire page
error.fix: Systematically scan from top to bottom, left to right

error.name: Wrong Heading Levels
error.symptom: Heading hierarchy skips levels or is based only on visual size
error.cause: Using visual appearance instead of document structure
error.fix: Assign heading levels based on logical hierarchy, not font size

error.name: Missing Alt Text
error.fix: ALWAYS provide descriptive alt_text for every Figure element

error.name: Skipping Analysis
error.cause: Rushing to output without systematic boundary tracing
error.fix: ALWAYS complete the full 5-step analysis before outputting JSON
